      • pickShardPath

        public ShardPath pickShardPath(ShardId shard)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Picks a target ShardPath to allocate and upgrade the given shard to. It picks the target based on a simple heuristic:
        • if the smallest datapath has 2x more space available that the shards total size the datapath with the most bytes for that shard is picked to minimize the amount of bytes to copy
        • otherwise the largest available datapath is used as the target no matter how big of a slice of the shard it already holds.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getSpaceUsedByShard

        protected long getSpaceUsedByShard(java.nio.file.Path path)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:

      • upgradeMultiDataPath

        public static void upgradeMultiDataPath(NodeEnvironment nodeEnv,
                                        ESLogger logger)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Runs an upgrade on all shards located under the given node environment if there is more than 1 data.path configured otherwise this method will return immediately.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
